Package com.mewna.catnip.entity.channel

Interface TextChannel

All Superinterfaces:
Channel, Entity, GuildChannel, GuildEntity, HasGuild, HasName, Mentionable, MessageChannel, Snowflake
All Known Subinterfaces:
NewsChannel
All Known Implementing Classes:
NewsChannelImpl, TextChannelImpl
public interface TextChannel
extends GuildChannel, MessageChannel, Mentionable
A channel in a guild that can have text messages sent in it.
Since:
9/12/18
Author:
natanbc

    • rateLimitPerUser

      @Nonnegative @CheckReturnValue int rateLimitPerUser()
      The slowmode set on this channel. A value of 0 means no slowmode. Bots are not affected by slowmode.
      Returns:
      The slowmode set on this channel, in seconds.
